Function Documentation

bool zclIsResponseRequiredByPayload ( ClusterId_t  cluster,
ZCL_CommandId_t  cmd,
uint8_t  dir,
uint8_t *  payload 
)

Checks if response for command is required based on its payload.

Parameters:
[in]cluster- cluster id of command
[in]cmd- command id
[in]dir- command direction
[in]payload- command payload
Returns:
true if resposne is required, false otherwise
bool zclIsResponseRequiredByAddrMode ( ZCL_Request_t *  req)

Checks whether response for command is required based on its address mode.

Parameters:
[in]req- pointer to request structure
Returns:
true - if response is required, false - otherwise.
